page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN S.NORMANTON
page.content: All these five attract industry to the area: {Industrial Estates. } Five industrial estates have opened. They are Wharf Road,Clover Nook,Rough Close,Brookhill and Berristow Lane. There are 80 factories in all.The main employers in our area are Filigree Textiles who employ about 250 and ECP who employ the same.The 80 factories in our area employ a total of about 3000 people.{Types of Industry In order of importance the industries are:Textiles,Engineering,Transport, Electrical,Plastics and various others In S.Normanton 35.9% of people work in Manufacturing industries.21.8% in Water & Energy industries.Other main jobs are Construction,Distribution & Catering.Unemployment is still higher than average in the country,for two reasons:Old miners can't find jobs & unemployed women (many more than men).
